'''''The Purest Heat''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to seal all the five [[geothermal vent]]s around the hot spring in the {{Quest|Is "Intensity" Really the Key?}}. 

==Gameplay Notes==
* The quest ''Is "Intensity" Really the Key?'' can be completed without sealing all the five vents if all three [[Koholasaur Whelp|little Koholosaurs]] are found. The remaining vents can be sealed after the quest is completed to get this achievement.
